messages.message: I was adding a new user to commerical, can we disable when you copy in an email to the email area it auto adds to the list below. I copied in an email from slack into the link and wanted to edit it but it put it direcly into the list below.
I’ve also been struggling with this. It also submits when you leave the tab.

Thanks for this feedback, we’ve tried a few iterations on this input component/format but could still use some more improvements.

cc @hannah @Siya @Xindi Xu
Good suggestion! We'll split the inputted value by`,` into multiple tags when user presses enter. I think it makes sense to disable the auto add/split on paste.
@Xindi Xu agreed! so we won't have auto-adding in any case, right?
Yep, we'll only add when user press enter
Thanks for feedback! This is a good suggestion that we were working through
